## Overview

This RMarkdown site contains the source code to reproduce the findings to ``A simple cervico-vaginal epigenetic test for screening and rapid triage of women with suspected endometrial cancer â€“ validation in several cohort and case/control sets'' (WID-qEC), structured as follows:

1. Plots for top 50 DMPs in the epigenome-wide discovery set
  * Figure 1
2. Threshold selection in the FORECEE Pilot Set
  * Figures 1, S9 and S10
3. Main display items
  * Tables 1-3
  * Figure 2
4. Association with epidemiological factors
  * Figure 11
  * Figure 12
  * Table S3
5. Barcelona Validation
  * Figure S13
  * Tables S4-S6
  * Figure S14
6. Lynch Cohort
  * Figure S15
7. Karolinska Cohort
  * Table S7
8. PPV/NPV
  * Figure S16
  
The "mldat" file (WID-qEC_manuscript_data) contains all relevant data.
